quoteText: Your choices about how we communicate with you differ depending on the purpose of the message and how it is delivered. Some messages are considered optional and some are necessary for you to manage your accounts with us. We use email, text messages, push notifications on your mobile device, and even paper mail depending on the situation and your preferences.
title: This service may use your personal information for marketing purposes

tosdr.case: This service may use your personal information for marketing purposes
